    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mortalis Coin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2110)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 94 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You are reduced to 0 Hit Points by damage but not immediately killed

**Requirement** You are an expert in Fortitude saves.
</row>

</column>

---

This small golden coin is usually stamped with the image of a boar or other resilient creature. If the triggering damage would cause you to become [dying 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) (typically due to a critical hit or your critical failure), you become dying 1 instead. In addition, for 10 minutes, you die from the dying condition at dying 5, rather than dying 4.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
